Bug #725

atom feed shows a wrong URL when using apache with mod_proxy

Added by Michele Azzolari 2 days ago. Updated 1 day ago.

Status:New Start date:12/28/2011
Priority:Normal Due date:
Assignee:- % Done:

0%
Category:- Spent time: -
Target version:-
Quote

Description

Setup: I have a virtual host for media.macno.org and I use mod_proxy to access my mediagoblin server (which listen on 127.0.0.1:6543)

Issue: atom feed self link uses a wrong url

For example requesting http://media.macno.org/u/macno/atom/ returns <link href="http://127.0.0.1:6543/u/macno/atom/" rel="self" />

Add

Related issues

Issue #

Delay: days Cancel

History

#1
Updated by Michele Azzolari 1 day ago

Fixed enabling the ProxyPreserveHost directive on Apache

Alias /mgoblin_media "/var/www/media.macno.org/user_dev/media/public/" 
    Alias /mgoblin_static "/var/www/media.macno.org/mediagoblin/static/"
ProxyPreserveHost On
    ProxyPass /mgoblin_static/ !
    ProxyPass /mgoblin_media/ !
    ProxyPass / http://127.0.0.1:6543/
    ProxyPassReverse / http://127.0.0.1:6543/
